value.name: Police Shooting in Long Beach Under Investigation, Suspect in Custody
value.description: A 26-year-old man who barricaded himself inside a home in Long Beach after he fired a gun as officers responded to reports of an assault, prompting officers to fire their weapons, was in custody Thursday.

value.name: Police shoot at man with gun in North Long Beach, but nobody is wounded, LBPD says
value.description: Before police shot, the man fired his gun, prompting officers to believe they were being targeted, the department said.

value.name: Jaime Lopez Found Guilty of First Degree Murder
value.description: Fresno, CA /*Jaime Lopez*/ showed little emotion as the verdict was read. The 20 year old killed 36 year old /*Jose Gallegos*/. A farm worker found Gallegos' body inside a burned out SUV near Kerman.

value.name: Carson Lanes Family Fun Center is on the market following owner's passing from COVID-19
value.description: Earlier this year, the owner of the Carson Lanes Family Fun Center, Eugene Burger, passed away from COVID-19. The facility was left to his family, who have decided to sell the property. Some Carson City residents are concerned that the Carson Lanes Family Fun Center has been sold to a buyer who has plans to demolish the entire facility and build a casino,

value.name: Carson City’s The Greenhouse Project in ‘urgent need’ of volunteer help at Carson Tahoe's Foothill Garden
value.description: Carson City’s local non-profit, the Greenhouse Project, is in urgent need of volunteer help at their Foothill Garden site located at the Carson Tahoe Medical Center campus. According to Jon Ruiter, Executive Director of the Greenhouse Project,

value.name: On The Road, At The Ballpark: Americans Celebrate Vaccinations, Lifting Businesses
value.description: Jaime Lopez took his family to a professional soccer game Saturday in Orlando, Fla., 2 1/2 weeks after getting his second dose of the Pfizer vaccine. “It was very exciting,” Lopez said.

value.name: Jl Rebel nips Shakalaka for MT Handicap win

value.name: 'So Exciting To Be Working Again': Americans Are Going Out, Boosting Jobs
value.description: Jaime Lopez took his family to a professional soccer game Saturday in Orlando, Fla., 2 1/2 weeks after getting his second dose of the Pfizer vaccine. "It was very exciting," Lopez said.
